name: Her Feet
description:
The male protagonist is a white-collar, he has a little secret hobby, like massaging girls' feet. But it's not an easy thing to get strange girls to accept it. The player needs to help him meet the girls and gain her trust, get her to agree and enjoy the guy massaging her feet.
· This is a selective role-playing game.
· The player has to make choices based on the storyline.
· Different choices develop into different storylines and endings.
· Exquisite 3D female character modeling.
· Beautiful and varied camera techniques.
· A rich and surprising plot.
